csci4448.AnimalShelter

Class HoldState

  • java.lang.Object
    • csci4448.AnimalShelter.HoldState

  • public class HoldState
extends java.lang.Object
    The state of an animal when it is on hold by a customer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HoldState() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeState(Animal a)
      Changes the animal's state from Adopted to On Hold
      java.lang.String getStateText()
      A method that provides the text to be shown next to the animal on the animal list shown to users
      boolean shouldShow()
      Provides information on whether or not the animal should show on the animal list shown to users

    • Method Detail

      • changeState

        public void changeState(Animal a)
        Changes the animal's state from Adopted to On Hold
        Parameters:
        a - the animal who's state is being changed

      • shouldShow

        public boolean shouldShow()
        Provides information on whether or not the animal should show on the animal list shown to users
        Returns:
        true, because an animal on hold should still be shown to the user in case they become available again

      • getStateText

        public java.lang.String getStateText()
        A method that provides the text to be shown next to the animal on the animal list shown to users
        Returns:
        the string "On Hold" because that is the current state of the animal
